channel.title: Run-server conecting
channel.description:
just changed my webclient name and server ip from "127.0.0.1"to my ip the server run normale & client run normale but always error connecting to server need help " i think the server that i run dont connect to the webclient because i changed server ip " pleease pm me back or skype : obby.xx
thx alot

item.title: Run-server conecting
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

[quote=“yosef2break, post:1, topic:537623”]just changed my webclient name and server ip from "127.0.0.1"to my ip
the server run normale & client run normale but always error connecting to server
need help " i think the server that i run dont connect to the webclient because i changed server ip "
pleease pm me back or
skype : obby.xx

thx alot[/quote]
I answered this tons of times, it get’s deleted automatically, i dont know why, anyways, If you wanna run it local so only you / your friends in the local network can play it, set the ip to 127.0.0.1. And if you want to make it public, set it to your no-ip. Remember, even if you set it public for other, and if you wanna play it, you NEED to play on 127.0.0.1, otherwise you will not be able to play it.

[size=1]I screenshot this, in the case its getting deleted again[/size]

Read full topic
